verbs.description: Patti LuPone [V: has] cried war against President Donald Trump — but she ’s singing the wrong song .
[ARG0: Patti LuPone] has [V: cried] [ARG1: war against President Donald Trump] — but she ’s singing the wrong song .
Patti LuPone has cried war against President Donald Trump — but she [V: ’s] singing the wrong song .
Patti LuPone has cried war against President Donald Trump — but [ARG0: she] ’s [V: singing] [ARG1: the wrong song] .
